import { Box, Button, Modal, Stack, TextField, } from '@mui/material'; import React from 'react' function AddProduct({open}, {setOpen},{form},{setForm}) { const style = { position: 'absolute', top: '50%', left: '50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)', width: 400, bgcolor: 'background.paper', border: '2px solid #000', boxShadow: 24, p: 4, }; return (
{setForm({...form, _id : e.target.value})}} /> {setForm({...form, pName : e.target.value})}} /> {setForm({...form, pPrice : e.target.value})}} /> {setForm({...form, pDesc : e.target.value})}} />
) } export default AddProduct
